\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath a \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w* with the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, because \add there is\add* no \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, nor \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, nor \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

By \w swearing|strong="H0422"\w*, and \w lying|strong="H3584"\w*, and \w killing|strong="H7523"\w*, and \w stealing|strong="H1589"\w*, and committing \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*, they break \w out|strong="H6555"\w*, and \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.\f + \fr 4.2 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

Therefore shall the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w*, and every one that \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* therein shall \w languish|strong="H0535"\w*, with the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and with the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; yea, the \w fishes|strong="H1709"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* also shall be taken \w away|strong="H0622"\w*.

Yet let no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w strive|strong="H7378"\w*, nor \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* \w another|strong="H0376"\w*: for thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add are\add* as they that \w strive|strong="H7378"\w* with the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

Therefore shalt thou \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* also shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* with thee in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and I will \w destroy|strong="H1820"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.\f + \fr 4.5 \ft destroy: Heb. cut off\f*

¶ My \w people|strong="H5971"\w* are \w destroyed|strong="H1820"\w* for lack of \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: because thou hast \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, I will also \w reject|strong="H3988"\w* thee, that thou shalt be no \w priest|strong="H3547"\w* to me: seeing thou hast \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I will also \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 4.6 \ft destroyed: Heb. cut off\f*

As they were \w increased|strong="H7230"\w*, so they \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against me: \add therefore\add* will I \w change|strong="H4171"\w* their \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* into \w shame|strong="H7036"\w*.

They eat \w up|strong="H0398"\w* the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and they \w set|strong="H5375"\w* their \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* on their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.\f + \fr 4.8 \ft set…: Heb. lift up their soul to\f*

And there shall be, like \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, like \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: and I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* them for their \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w reward|strong="H7725"\w* them their \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.\f + \fr 4.9 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*\f + \fr 4.9 \ft reward: Heb. cause to return\f*

For they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and not have \w enough|strong="H7646"\w*: they shall commit \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w*, and shall not \w increase|strong="H6555"\w*: because they have left \w off|strong="H5800"\w* to take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
\w Whoredom|strong="H2184"\w* and \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* and new \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

¶ My \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* counsel at their \w stocks|strong="H6086"\w*, and their \w staff|strong="H4731"\w* \w declareth|strong="H5046"\w* unto them: for the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w whoredoms|strong="H2183"\w* hath caused \add them\add* to \w err|strong="H8582"\w*, and they have gone a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* from under their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

They \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* upon the \w tops|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* upon the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, under \w oaks|strong="H0437"\w* and \w poplars|strong="H3839"\w* and \w elms|strong="H0424"\w*, because the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* thereof \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: therefore your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* shall commit \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w*, and your \w spouses|strong="H3618"\w* shall commit \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*.

I will not \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* when they commit \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w*, nor your \w spouses|strong="H3618"\w* when they commit \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*: for themselves are \w separated|strong="H6504"\w* with \w whores|strong="H2181"\w*, and they \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* with \w harlots|strong="H6948"\w*: therefore the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that\add* doth not \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H3832"\w*.\f + \fr 4.14 \ft I will not: or, Shall I not\f*\f + \fr 4.14 \ft fall: or, be punished\f*

¶ Though thou, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, play the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \add yet\add* let not \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w offend|strong="H0816"\w*; and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* not ye unto \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, neither go ye \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Beth-aven|strong="H1007"\w*, nor \w swear|strong="H7650"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*.

For \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* slideth \w back|strong="H5637"\w* as a \w backsliding|strong="H5637"\w* \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w*: now the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* them as a \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* in a large \w place|strong="H4800"\w*.
\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add is\add* \w joined|strong="H2266"\w* to \w idols|strong="H6091"\w*: let him \w alone|strong="H3240"\w*.

Their \w drink|strong="H5435"\w* is \w sour|strong="H5493"\w*: they have committed \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w* \w continually|strong="H2181"\w*: her \w rulers|strong="H4043"\w* \add with\add* \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* do \w love|strong="H0157"\w*, \w Give|strong="H3051"\w* ye.\f + \fr 4.18 \ft sour: Heb. gone\f*\f + \fr 4.18 \ft rulers: Heb. shields\f*

The \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* hath bound her \w up|strong="H6887"\w* in her \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, and they shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* because of their \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*.
